name: Vector Search & Embeddings
description: Projects using vector databases and semantic embeddings for memory retrieval

name: Knowledge Graph
description: Projects leveraging knowledge graphs for structured memory representation

name: Temporal & Time-series
description: Projects with explicit temporal modeling and time-series memory

name: Compression & Optimization
description: Projects focused on memory compression and token optimization

name: Production-Ready Platforms
description: Battle-tested frameworks with high adoption and production deployments

name: Local-First & Privacy
description: Projects emphasizing local deployment and data privacy

name: Multi-Agent & Collaborative
description: Projects supporting multi-agent memory sharing and collaboration

name: Learning & Self-Improvement
description: Systems focused on continual learning and agent improvement

name: Framework Integration
description: Projects with deep integration into agent frameworks (LangChain, CrewAI, etc.)
